sentences.en: Customs officials have made a series of contradictory statements about the equipment.
sentences.cn: 海关官员们对这种设备作出了一系列互相矛盾的陈述。

sentences.en: He did something contradictory to his orders.
sentences.cn: 他做了与他的命令不符的事.

sentences.en: He is notorious for making unexpected, often self-contradictory, comments.
sentences.cn: 他发表的那些出人意料而且经常自相矛盾的评论令他臭名昭著。

sentences.en: He sent out a few cautious feelers and received some contradictory answers.
sentences.cn: 他作过几次谨慎的试探,得到的答复前后不一.

sentences.en: I don't want contradictory reports circulated regarding what I'm about to do.
sentences.cn: 关于我要做的事情,我不想给传得驴头不对马嘴.

sentences.en: It is one of those interesting words that have two contradictory meanings.
sentences.cn: 这类词有趣得很,它有两个互相矛盾的词义.

sentences.en: Like so many Newspeak words, this word has two mutually contradictory meanings.
sentences.cn: 这个字眼像新话中的许多其他字眼一样, 有两个相互矛盾的含义.

sentences.en: The answers to this question were various and contradictory.
sentences.cn: 对这个问题的回答前后不同,而且自相矛盾.

sentences.en: The contradictory statements are symptoms of disarray in the administration.
sentences.cn: 这些互相矛盾的说法反映了管理的混乱。

sentences.en: The evidence demonstrates how easily people can hold mutually contradictory beliefs.
sentences.cn: 证据表明人很容易持有相互矛盾的信念.

sentences.en: The Judaeo-Christian tradition is diverse, jumbled, contradictory, at every point inviting inquiry and debate.
sentences.cn: 犹太-基督教传统呈现多样化，混乱复杂，相互矛盾，在各个方面都会引发质疑和争论。

sentences.en: The public are capable of holding a number of apparently contradictory attitudes.
sentences.cn: 公众可能会持有数种显然互相矛盾的态度。

sentences.en: We are faced with two apparently contradictory statements.
sentences.cn: 我们面前这两种说法显然是矛盾的。

sentences.en: What he said was self - contradictory.

words.tran_cn: 反驳；否定；与…矛盾；与…抵触

trans.tran_en: two statements, beliefs etc that are contradictory are different and therefore cannot both be true or correct
